data.eml:eml: A new species of sublittoral marine gastrotrich, Lepidodasys ligni sp. n. (Macrodasyida, Lepidodasyidae), from the Atlantic coast of Florida

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hochberg, Rick, Atherton, Sarah, Gross, Vladimir (2013): A new species of sublittoral marine gastrotrich, Lepidodasys ligni sp. n. (Macrodasyida, Lepidodasyidae), from the Atlantic coast of Florida. ZooKeys 289: 1-12, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.289.4764, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.289.4764
